'''Well-Packaged Gebratenes Fleisch mit Sauerkraut''' is a [[Quest Item]] given by [[Sara]] during {{Quest|Speech and Etiquette}}.

==Trivia==
*"Gebratenes Fleisch mit Sauerkraut" is German for "Roasted Meat with {{w|Sauerkraut}}."
